item.title: FDA says the Zepbound shortage is over. Here’s what that means for compounding pharmacies, patients who used off-brand versions
item.description: The decision will largely prevent compounding pharmacies from making and selling compounded versions of the drug in the next two to three months.

item.title: Google CEO Pichai struggled to navigate a pressure-filled year
item.description: Google CEO Pichai notched some AI wins but struggled to navigate a pressure-filled year.

item.title: OpenAI says it needs 'more capital than we’d imagined' as it lays out for-profit plan
item.description: OpenAI said in a blog post Friday that heading into 2025, "we have to becomean enduring company," which requires changing its structure.

item.title: Credit card debt set to hit record levels as consumer holiday spending rises
item.description: Consumers are on track to set a spending record this holiday season. But leaning on credit cards could come at a high cost.

item.title: Richard Parsons, former Time Warner CEO, dies at age 76
item.description: Richard Parsons helped Time Warner divorce from AOL after what was considered the worst takeover in history.
